describe: Denmark, a Scandinavian country, is known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning landscapes. It is a constitutional monarchy with a high standard of living and a strong emphasis on sustainability and innovation.

cities.name: 🏝 Copenhagen
cities.geographical_location: Located on the eastern coast of the island of Zealand and partially on Amager.
cities.climate: Copenhagen has an oceanic climate with mild, windy winters and cool summers.

cities.name: 🏝 Aarhus
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the east coast of the Jutland peninsula.
cities.climate: Aarhus experiences a temperate oceanic climate with mild summers and cool winters.

cities.name: 🏝 Odense
cities.geographical_location: Located on the island of Funen.
cities.climate: Odense has a temperate oceanic climate with moderate rainfall throughout the year.

cities.name: 🌆 Aalborg
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the North Jutland region.
cities.climate: Aalborg has a temperate oceanic climate with cool summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Rugbrød, a traditional Danish rye bread.
